description: This source file sets up Express routes for job-related operations, including CRUD actions, application handling, and matching. It utilizes controllers for handling logic and includes Swagger annotations for API documentation.

methods.name: router.get('/jobs/:id')
methods.description: Handles GET request to fetch job details by ID, delegated to jobsExtController.details.

methods.name: router.post('/jobs')
methods.description: Handles POST request to create a new job, delegated to jobsExtController.create.

methods.name: router.put('/jobs/:id')
methods.description: Handles PUT request to update job information, delegated to jobsExtController.update.

methods.name: router.delete('/jobs/:id')
methods.description: Handles DELETE request to remove a job, delegated to jobsExtController.remove.

methods.name: router.post('/jobs/:id/apply')
methods.description: Handles POST request for candidates to apply to a job, delegated to jobsExtController.apply.

methods.name: router.get('/jobs/:id/applicants')
methods.description: Handles GET request to retrieve applicants for a specific job, delegated to jobsExtController.applicants.

methods.name: router.patch('/applications/:applicationId/status')
methods.description: Handles PATCH request to update application status, delegated to jobsExtController.updateApplicationStatus.

methods.name: router.get('/jobs')
methods.description: Handles GET request to list jobs, delegated to jobsController.list.

methods.name: router.get('/jobs/match')
methods.description: Handles GET request for job matching, delegated to jobsController.match.
